statements: SELECT * FROM MaintenanceReminders WHERE vehicle_id = '11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111';
SELECT reminder_id, vehicle_id, maintenance_task FROM MaintenanceReminders WHERE mileage_interval > 5000;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceReminders WHERE mileage_interval BETWEEN 3000 AND 6000 ORDER BY last_notified_at DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT(vehicle_id) FROM MaintenanceReminders WHERE time_interval >= '1 week';
SELECT reminder_id, mileage_interval FROM MaintenanceReminders WHERE last_notified_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceReminders WHERE vehicle_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT reminder_id, maintenance_task, mileage_interval FROM MaintenanceReminders WHERE mileage_interval > 5000 AND time_interval = INTERVAL '3 months';
SELECT DISTINCT vehicle_id, maintenance_task FROM MaintenanceReminders WHERE time_interval > INTERVAL '1 year' ORDER BY last_notified_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceReminders WHERE maintenance_task LIKE '%oil%' ORDER BY mileage_interval ASC;
SELECT reminder_id, vehicle_id, mileage_interval, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM last_notified_at) AS last_notified_month FROM MaintenanceReminders WHERE reminder_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE id = 1
SELECT task_name, interval_type FROM reminders WHERE interval_value > 10
SELECT task_name, interval_type, interval_value FROM reminders ORDER BY task_name DESC
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE mileage < 50000
SELECT vehicle_name, mileage FROM vehicles ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE interval_type = 'daily' ORDER BY last_sent_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT task_name, interval_type, interval_value FROM reminders WHERE interval_value > 5 AND interval_type = 'weekly' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT task_name, interval_type, DATE_FORMAT(last_sent_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS last_sent_date FROM reminders WHERE interval_type = 'monthly' ORDER BY last_sent_at ASC
SELECT vehicle_name, mileage FROM vehicles WHERE mileage < 50000 ORDER BY vehicle_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM reminders r INNER JOIN vehicles v ON r.id = v.vehicle_id WHERE r.interval_type = 'monthly' AND v.mileage > 60000 ORDER BY v.last_maintenance_date ASC, r.last_sent_at DESC
SELECT * FROM reminders;
SELECT id, task_name, mileage_interval FROM reminders;
SELECT task_name, time_interval FROM reminders ORDER BY task_name DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, last_mileage FROM vehicles WHERE last_mileage > 5000;
SELECT vehicle_name, last_mileage, last_maintenance_date FROM vehicles ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE mileage_interval > 500 AND time_interval < 30;
SELECT task_name, mileage_interval, time_interval FROM reminders ORDER BY task_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT vehicle_name, last_mileage, last_maintenance_date FROM vehicles WHERE last_mileage > 10000;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_log WHERE date_completed BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT maintenance_task, mileage_completed, date_completed FROM maintenance_log WHERE mileage_completed > 5000 ORDER BY date_completed ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM reminders;
SELECT reminder_id, reminder_type, last_reminder_date FROM reminders;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name, mileage FROM vehicles WHERE mileage > 50000;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM maintenance_tasks ORDER BY task_name DESC;
SELECT reminder_id, vehicle_id, mileage_interval FROM reminders WHERE reminder_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT * FROM reminders;
SELECT reminder_id, vehicle_id, reminder_type FROM reminders ORDER BY last_reminder_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, mileage FROM vehicles WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE LENGTH(task_description) > 50;

SELECT r.reminder_id, v.vehicle_name, m.task_name FROM reminders r JOIN vehicles v ON r.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id JOIN tasks_reminders t ON r.reminder_id = t.reminder_id JOIN maintenance_tasks m ON t.task_id = m.task_id WHERE r.mileage_interval > v.mileage;
SELECT * FROM reminders WHERE reminder_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, reminder_type, mileage_interval FROM reminders WHERE vehicle_id = 5;
SELECT vehicle_name, year FROM vehicles WHERE last_mileage > 50000;
SELECT task_name FROM tasks WHERE duration < INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE phone LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT * FROM reminders;
SELECT task_name, reminder_type, last_reminder_date FROM reminders WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT r.reminder_id, r.task_name, v.vehicle_name FROM reminders r JOIN vehicles v ON r.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id;
SELECT t.task_name, t.description, v.vehicle_name FROM tasks t JOIN vehicles v ON t.task_id = v.vehicle_id;
SELECT u.username, n.notification_date, r.task_name FROM users u JOIN notifications n ON u.user_id = n.user_id JOIN reminders r ON n.reminder_id = r.reminder_id;
